overview: Gary Cofran has been active for the past 30 years in the sales, marketing and operational / technology needs of the Chemical & Industrial markets. Gary began his career with Tenneco Oil Company and Jefferson Chemical, afterwards joining Mitsui America where he spent the next 20 years in various chemical trading positions and was the first “Westerner” to achieve the position of Vice President. Gary then moved to SK Global for 8 years acting as the Senior Vice President of Petrochemical and Oil Products trading. Gary left SK Global to join ChemConnect, a leading online chemical exchange, where he served as Senior Vice President of Worldwide Sales. Gary was the former President of the Southwest Chemical Association (SCA), a 700 member organization of commercial buyers and sellers in the Chemical and Feedstocks business. Gary earned his B.S. in chemical engineering from Purdue University, his MBA in finance from the University of Texas and attended the Advanced Management Program at Harvard University.
